Posts.Content: Sassasb wrote: I don't know much yet. The doctor called and said something like dci. Meeting with her later today to get the details. I was upset at first but now I think I am just pissed off. I retired early and was enjoying life with my husband. Now this. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 1.5 cm lump- just found out it is cancer Sassasb swg

Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2017 10:38AM Sassasb wrote: thank you both. Most of the 3 core samples showed dcis. One sample had a 1 mm spot of stage 1, grade 1. Having an mri and chest xray tomorrow as part of pre-lumpectomy testing, but other than checking the right breast, I am not sure what mri is looking for. Hopefully, nothing has spread to lymph nodes. I also need to have a hysterectomy due to huge fibroids. Maybe the two surgeries can be combined? I'm glad to have found this site because I am clueless about bc and am feeling very overwhelmed right now.

Posts.Content: Sassasb wrote: Found a lump during a self exam on August 9th. Gyn checked on Aug 16th and referred me for a diagnostic mammo. Had that on the 23rd but nothing showed so US immediately after (only on left breast). 1.5cm hypoechoic, irregular mass rated as 4A. I have a core biopsy coming up on September 11th. Hoping for the best. Log in to post a reply
